text: La Banabasɨ dɨ mugɨluŋ Susɨ uavɨmi. Polɨ nɨbu ciaŋ putɨ sadaŋ nudɨ mugɨluŋ Helɨmesɨ uavɨmi.14.12 Hulaŋ iamɨgali hɨdɨlɨ mu mu agɨlaŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ nameŋ lamavɨhadami. Mugɨluŋ akape agɨlaŋ uaiaŋ susu hɨvɨ hɨniavɨlalɨ uavɨhadami. Mugɨluŋ Susɨ nɨbu mugɨluŋ agɨladɨ hali hɨsɨŋ hɨnilalɨ uavɨhadami. Mugɨluŋ Helɨmesɨ nɨbu ciaŋ via ulalɨ velalɨ uavɨhadami.
